name: Monster Splatter
description:
This is a tap to kill monster game where you kill the monster or it will kill you. It is made for the GameOff 2019 game jam which had the topic 'leaps and bounds'.

The game is not built due to the lack of having a mac (and all the devs of the game have iPhone and no Androids) but It was tested using Unity remote. The download will have the build of the game (need to own a mac to put it on your iPhone).

To play it users need to know how to import the build on to an iPhone using XCode.
